"A.P.241/10/27": "Wait! Don't move. Stay right there."
"It's Dia and that Zeno guy. Well, they're havin' a great damn time, ain't they?"
"Are you jealous?"
"So? No big deal."
"HAH! Don't make me laugh. It just gets on my damn nerves not knowin' what that Zeno kid's blabbering on about."
"No big deal my ass! Who knows what sorta weird crap that punk's tryin' to put in her head?!"
"Looks like their little chat's over. Alright, I'm takin' over for a bit."
"W-what can I do for you, <%me>?"

"Hey. <%me>.
...Do somethin'."
"Um... <%me>? Are you... well?"
"...Hehehe. You're an odd one sometimes."
"You know, there were times when Master Gettemhart would stare at me like that. It feels kind of nostalgic."
"Especially since I just got done talking with Zeno about him and my sister."
"About Gettemhart?"
"About your sister?"
"Yes. Sometimes I ask people about the side that I never got to see of those two."
"And what exactly we talked about..."
"...should be kept secret. I hope that's okay."
"It's something that would make Master Gettemhart quite angry--no, embarrassed if he heard it."
"And since you seem to remind me of him so much lately, I can't let you hear it either."
"So that's how it is. Anyways, I should get going."
"...Zeno, you little bastard! The hell's he think he's tryin' to pull with Dia?!"
"Hey! That punk's getting his ass kicked RIGHT NOW, let's go! Just gimme your body real quick!"
